name: T H E S H O E beta patch 1.1
name_original: T H E S H O E beta patch 1.1
description:
A Puzzle game where you move cubes into holes and avoid shoes. If you touch a shoe, it restarts the level. Try to finish the level by putting all of the cubes in holes and not hitting the shoes. More levels to come soon!

                                                       ==CONTROLS==

x/enter: action (example: moving on from dialogue)

arrow keys: move (obviously lol)

r: restart

Thanks for playing! consider donating!
